vsParam:
Once again, we don't celebrate that day in the Fairyland.
So I'm so...oo looking forward to it! Hehe...
Oh my god, Peppermint, you're interested in Valentine's Day too?

Of course! I can feast on so much beautiful and
tasty chocolate! Heehee, heehee!

You, wait... Keep your saliva in your mouth,
as it's already wet the ground...

Alright, I understand that. After all, it's an annual festival
when you can eat delicious chocolate as much as possible!

Uh, Sorel, you're going to eat chocolate
as much as possible? No no no, I don't think so...
People in the Academy will give me so much chocolate!

Uh, really!? Why why~!?
Why could you receive so much chocolate~!?

What do you mean?! I'm so popular in the Academy!
Isn't that perfectly normal?!
Ah haha. Sorel does receive much chocolate every year.

Oh, that's unbelievable...
But this year, I'm sorry, Sorel!

Because... I will receive more chocolate than you~!
I'll receive the most chocolate in the Academy~!

Jesus. That sounds beautiful, Peppermint.
But... you wish. You will not get that much chocolate!

There is a "Unshakable King of Chocolate"
in the Academy! I'm far from being his match!

"Unshakable King of Chocolate"!?
Who... Who is it!?
Oh, speaking of the devil... Look.

What, Tandrion?
The "Unshakable King of Chocolate" is Tandrion?

Yeah, he is. The chocolate he receives every year piles up.
I highly doubt that he'd grow sick of all the chocolate in the end...

Haha... Even though Tandrion looks "like that",
he's actually very considerate and popular.

You're speaking ill of me behind my back? Hey!
Never mind. I happen to be looking for you.

What? You're here to extend a challenge to me!?
I will not lose it to you this year! Because I...

Extend a challenge? What are you talking about?
I need you to do me a favor.

I got a report that a lot of monsters intruded into
Lord Rose Hip's mansion.

And these monsters look very strange...
It's said they're some chocolate monsters...

Chocolate... monsters!? Are you nuts?
You're stupid as you've eaten too much chocolate?

Idiot! I'm perfectly normal!
Anyway, the Guard can't deal with them.
Could you please do me a favor?

Yeah, we'd like to give you a hand. But why are
the monsters only crowding in Lord Rose Hip's mansion?

I have no idea.
Help investigate it if you're available.

OK, got it.
You owe me this, keep that in mind!

Oh, in return...
I had the shop prepare many handy items.

You're free to exchange what you've gained in the investigation
and hunt of the monsters for what you want in the shop.

Oh, that's so considerate!
I'll just put the chocolate battle aside for now!

Exactly!
So... let's hurry to Lord Rose Hip's mansion!
